channel.title: CVE Feed for The Tcpdump Group -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Tcpdump Group -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-2397|2024-04-12T13:22:01.636Z -- The Tcpdump Group -- tcpdump
item.description: Due to a bug in packet data buffers management, the PPP printer in tcpdump can enter an infinite loop when reading a crafted DLT_PPP_SERIAL .pcap savefile. This problem does not affect any tcpdump release, but it affected the git master branch from 2023-06-05 to 2024-03-21.
